headline: Steel Dynamics Provides Third Quarter 2025 Earnings Guidance
summary: Steel Dynamics, Inc. (NASDAQ/GS: STLD) today provided third quarter 2025 earnings guidance in the range of $2.60 to $2.64 per diluted share, with improved earnings from each of the company's three operating platforms. Comparatively, the company's sequential second quarter 2025 earnings were $2.01 per diluted share, and prior year third quarter earnings were $2.05 per diluted share.
